page.title: 07FARMING, SHOTTESBROOKE.
page.content:
This area has been used for farming for {centuries}probably since the original Domesday Book was compiled.
The total number of workers on each farm is much less now than 20 years ago because of {machinery}. The owner of {Shottesbrooke farm} employs a {manager}who also looks after 2 other farms nearby.In{1985} they have bought several new pieces of {machinery}including 2 tractors 1 L. G. P. sprayer 1 trailer and 1 saw. There are {4 tractor drivers}employed there and{1 fitter}to service the machines.It is an{arable farm} of 602 hectares,growing oil seed rape, wheat,barley,cabbage and peas with a few head of cattle.
